meta_info: ::id DF-200-192448-618_9860.1 ::date 2014-03-16T11:01:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Tony Blair defended his immigration policies a couple of months back and I have to say I agree with him. # ::save-date Fri Jan 29, 2016 ::file DF-200-192448-618_9860_1.txt
sentence: Tony Blair defended his immigration policies a couple of months back and I have to say I agree with him.

meta_info: ::id DF-200-192448-618_9860.2 ::date 2014-03-16T11:20:53 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt I've always viewed immigration's goal was to try change Britain's demographics and making it a fairer society in the long run. # ::save-date Thu Oct 12, 2017 ::file DF-200-192448-618_9860_2.txt
sentence: I've always viewed immigration's goal was to try change Britain's demographics and making it a fairer society in the long run.

meta_info: ::id DF-200-192448-618_9860.3 ::date 2014-03-16T04:46:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt IMO we have become a more mulitcultural nation, and and an ethnically richer diverse one at that which was necessary. # ::save-date Thu Oct 12, 2017 ::file DF-200-192448-618_9860_3.txt
sentence: IMO we have become a more mulitcultural nation, and and an ethnically richer diverse one at that which was necessary.

meta_info: ::id DF-200-192448-618_9860.4 ::date 2014-03-16T04:53:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Changing the demographics is important for Britain, it's important for a lot of nations. # ::save-date Sat Mar 29, 2014 ::file DF-200-192448-618_9860_4.txt
sentence: Changing the demographics is important for Britain, it's important for a lot of nations.

meta_info: ::id DF-200-192448-618_9860.5 ::date 2014-03-16T04:57:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt To those anti-immigrant nationalists who hate this, look at Obama, probably one of the most popular human beings of all time, if not the most popular ever. # ::save-date Thu Dec 21, 2017 ::file DF-200-192448-618_9860_5.txt
sentence: To those anti-immigrant nationalists who hate this, look at Obama, probably one of the most popular human beings of all time, if not the most popular ever.

meta_info: ::id DF-200-192448-618_9860.15 ::date 2014-03-16T00:07:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Where Tony Blair and his government got it wrong was in underestimating the number who would migrate from the new countries in the EU, and not then providing the resources to support this, for example in English language support in schools. # ::save-date Thu Feb 4, 2016 ::file DF-200-192448-618_9860_15.txt
sentence: Where Tony Blair and his government got it wrong was in underestimating the number who would migrate from the new countries in the EU, and not then providing the resources to support this, for example in English language support in schools.
